definition: Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail

sentences.english: I went to Cuba. I went to Monaco. I went to Spain.
sentences.chinese: 在这段时间里我去了古巴，摩纳哥，西班牙。

sentences.english: Cuba gold by fragluxe is a luxurious blend of orientals with a blend of florals.
sentences.chinese: 古巴金是一种奢侈的东方花香调。

sentences.english: My chamber pot is in the form & size of a Hubbard squash.
sentences.chinese: 我的尿壶是根据古巴瓜的形状大小而作。

sentences.english: The abolition of capitalism and landlordism in Cuba represented an enormous step forward.
sentences.chinese: 古巴对资本主义和地主制度的废除是一个很大的进步。

sentences.english: There is no mention of them in ancient Babylonian records.
sentences.chinese: 但在古巴比伦时期的记录中，却只字未提。

sentences.english: June 12, Cuba's Luo Bosi kiss trophy celebration.
sentences.chinese: 6月12日，古巴选手罗伯斯亲吻奖杯庆祝。

sentences.english: Cuba insisted on removal of the embargo.
sentences.chinese: 古巴方面坚持要求美国撤消封港令。

sentences.english: Cuba would view these measures as important steps to improve the frosty relationship between both countries.
sentences.chinese: 古巴把这些行为视为改善两国的冷淡关系的重要步骤。

sentences.english: China beat Cuba in the women's Olympic volleyball final.
sentences.chinese: 在奥运会女子排球决赛中，中国队击败了古巴队。

sentences.english: She wondered what kind of place Cuba was, and if it was anything like home.
sentences.chinese: 她不知道古巴是什么样的地方，是否和自己家乡一样。

sentences.english: In addition to the Burmese, Ms. Sauerbrey pointed to the Cuba and Vietnamese Montagnards.
sentences.chinese: 除了缅甸人，她指出还有古巴人和越南的山地居民。

sentences.english: His mother was from Singapore, his father from Cuba.
sentences.chinese: 马丁内兹的妈妈是新加坡人，爸是古巴人。

sentences.english: His father was a wealth sugar planter and his mother came from the Cuban landed gentry.
sentences.chinese: 爸爸是富裕的甘蔗种植园主，妈妈来自古巴地主阶级。

sentences.english: The yacht went to Cuba, apparently breaking the American embargo.
sentences.chinese: “夏风号”曾去过古巴，很明显违反了美国的禁运令。

sentences.english: There is a non-Cuban brand with the same name.
sentences.chinese: 有一个同名的非古巴的品牌。

sentences.english: But the original Cuban sandwich wasn’t toasted.
sentences.chinese: 但是最初的古巴三明治并不烘烤。

definition: Puerto Rico, self-governing unincorporated territory of the United States
Latin America/abbr. for 拉丁美洲
Guatemala/see also 瓜地馬拉|瓜地马拉[Gua1 di4 ma3 la1]

pinyin: Duo1 mi3 ni2 jia1 Gong4 he2 guo2
